title: Unemployment rate in Scotland 2000 to 2019
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Unemployment rate, containing a total of 20 data points.
In general Unemployment rate has fallen over the Year.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2008 and 2009.
Maximum Unemployment rate, about 8.2 was reported at Year 2010
Minimum Unemployment rate about 3.6 was reached at Year 2019
min_summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Unemployment rate, containing a total of 20 data points.
